item.title: Books and chapters

item.title: Journal articles

DOI The Caribbean Struggle for Freedom - Freedom Roots: Histories from the Caribbean. By Laurent Dubois and Richard Lee Turits. Chapel Hill: University of North Carolina Press, 2019.
